nodes.name: start
nodes.description: As you sweep through the inky void and the site comes into view, you're puzzled by what you see. On a small asteroid sits a vending machine. Despite the odd runes lining its surface, you're fairly certain that the image on the front is a can of soda. While ordinary common sense would dictate that drinking strange alien soda is a bad idea, you can't help but be curious about what exactly this machine dispenses.  There's one problem, however- what currency does this thing take?

choices.name: Leave.
choices.delay_message: There are better ways to die than drinking alien soda.

choices.name: Try a holocredit chit.
choices.delay_message: Hopefully whoever made this machine is part of the Galactic Currency Union...

choices.name: Search around for some loose change.
choices.delay_message: There's a surprising amount of stuff on this asteroid to search...

nodes.name: it's_stuck
nodes.description: Well, only one way to find out, right? You produce a holocredit chit (helpfully taken from the science budget, I'm sure they won't miss it) and jam it into the slot. Then, you realise your mistake, as it sticks in the slot. Whoops. Time to try the old fashioned way, I suppose.

choices.name: Time to try something a bit more daring?
choices.delay_message: In hindsight, why would this accept human currency, anyway?

nodes.name: lost_wallet
nodes.description: Searching around, you come across a lost wallet in a small crater. Flipping it open, inside you find a family photo of 3 identical looking grey aliens in comically different outfits, an (expired) credit card for a bank you've never heard of, a loyalty card to McDonkalds, and, in the coin pouch, a single black coin with glowing purple lines. This is (presumably) what you're looking for.

choices.name: Return to the machine with the coin.
choices.delay_message: It doesn't count as theft if you found it, right?

nodes.name: choices_choices
nodes.description: You slip the coin into the slot- it's a perfect fit. Now comes the hard part: picking a button on the machine to press.

nodes.name: cha_clunk
nodes.description: With a satisfying cha-clunk, your fizzy prize drops into the tray. You swipe it, and move on from the site.

choices.name: Sweet, sugary victory.
choices.delay_message: Hopefully this doesn't like, freeze solid in space. That would be bad, right?

nodes.name: smashing
nodes.description: You maneuver the drone into position and begin ramming it into the machine. The machine sways and shakes, and just as you think it may be getting somewhere, it falls directly onto your drone. Now, not only do you not have any soda, but you don't have a drone, either. Dummy.

choices.name: Disconnect.
choices.delay_message: Don't feel too bad, it happens to the best of us sometimes.
